mapper.insert: insert into user_addr (addr_id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_mobile, province, city, area, addr, post_code, status, common_addr, create_time, update_time) values (#{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commonAddr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
